description: Fun to make and even more fun to eat! Make these vegetarian rice paper rolls with tofu and peanut sauce for a deliciously fresh lunch.
keywords: Rice paper rolls,Microwave,Seafood free,Egg free,Tofu,Dairy free
name: Veggie Rice Paper Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-high heat. Add tofu and cook, turning, for 5 minutes or until browned. Transfer to a plate lined with paper towel.

Meanwhile, to make the peanut dipping sauce, place peanut butter and soy sauce in a heatproof microwave-safe bowl. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 20 seconds or until peanut butter softens. Stir in remaining ingredients until smooth.

Fill a large bowl with lukewarm water. Soak 1 rice paper sheet in water for 10 seconds, remove and place on a board. Top with a small amount of lettuce, cabbage, carrot, mint, tofu and peanuts. Roll, tucking in sides, to form a roll. Repeat with remaining rice paper and ingredients.
Serve rice paper rolls with any remaining lettuce leaves, mint and peanut dipping sauce.
